page.title: 15SCRAP METAL COMPANY
page.content:
SCRAP METAL YARD IN BIGGIN HILL
The scrap metal company is nearly 30 years old. This industry was started by the present owner's father. His son has worked there for nearly 25 years. Now in the yard, they have a 30 ton weigh bridge, various lorries and forklift trucks. There are lots of old items in the yard but I think the most unusual thing was a load of lead coffins. The size of the yard is approximately 1.5 acres. They have dealt with several modern small planes which have unfortunately crashed in the area. Also quite a lot of parts of rusting old Secon World War planes and machine gun cases. The yard is open from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. on Monday to Friday.
